content: buttonhole row 35-54 modified fishermanʼs rib section row 55-56 insert vertical buttonhole row 57-76 modified fishermanʼs rib section row 77-78 insert vertical buttonhole row 79-98 modified fishermanʼs rib section row 99-100 insert vertical buttonhole row 101-120 modified fishermanʼs rib section row 121-122 insert vertical buttonhole row 123-142 modified fishermanʼs rib section row 143-144 insert vertical buttonhole row 145-164 modified fishermanʼs rib section row 165-177 k across bind off** weave in ends sew buttons into place **recommended bind off jenyʼs stretchy bind off how to knit through the bottom stitch top stich bottom stich knit through this loop as usual how to close vertical buttonholes slip the first st kw yo return st to left needle ktbl with yo stitch with yo turn if necessary sl 1st st pattern across turn pattern to 1 st before yo repeat above repeat until all yos have been worked
